title: Sydney 300 Announces Return to Sydney Motorsport Park
author: Event Management
excerpt: The Sydney 300 endurance race returns to Sydney Motorsport Park with enhanced facilities and an expanded support program for the 2025 event.
body: The Sydney 300 endurance race is set to return to Sydney Motorsport Park with significant facility enhancements and an expanded support program that will make the 2025 event the most comprehensive yet. The improvements address both competitor and spectator experience.

Facility upgrades include expanded pit facilities, improved spectator viewing areas, and enhanced media centers. The circuit has also undergone safety improvements including new barrier systems and upgraded medical facilities to meet the latest international standards.

"We're committed to making the Sydney 300 a world-class endurance racing event," said Event Director Rachel Green. "The facility improvements and expanded program will provide an exceptional experience for everyone involved, from competitors to spectators."

The support program will feature multiple racing categories, including historic sports cars, open-wheel formula cars, and touring car championships. This diverse program ensures continuous on-track action throughout the weekend.

Ticket sales for the 2025 Sydney 300 begin next month, with early bird pricing and VIP packages available. The event is expected to attract the largest field in the race's history, with entries already exceeding previous years' totals.
